list.abs: ...菲油果编辑中文名，菲油果学名，Feijoa sellowiana(桃金娘科)菲油果(feijoa sellowiana),又名肥吉果、费约果、凤榴,系桃金娘科、菲油果属常绿灌木或小乔木。原产南美国家,上世纪30年代初传入日本,在全球亚热带气假温暖地区广泛种植。常绿灌木或小乔木,原产.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, named after J. da Silva Feijó (1760–1824), Brazilian naturalist

means.word_mean: 1. South American shrub having edible greenish plumlike fruit
2. dark-green kiwi-sized tropical fruit with white flesh; used chiefly for jellies and preserves
